doc.previous: Composers who included Almglocken among their musical palette include T ru Takemitsu Jo Kondo Gustav Mahler Richard Strauss Roy Harter John Adams Joseph Schwantner and Karlheinz Stockhausen Olivier Messiaen used multiple chromatic sets of clapperless cowbells in several of his compositions notably Et expecto resurrectionem mortuorum and Couleurs de la cit celeste
